definitions: 職人[しょくにん] (n, adj-no) worker, mechanic, artisan, craftsman
english: Weapon seller
japanese: 武器職人の小屋

definitions: 一足[ひとあし] (n) a step,short distance, short time
english: But if it's the 'Keystone' you're looking for, you're too late. Don't have it.
japanese: けど、ひと足遅かったな『キーストーン』ならもう、ねぇよ

definitions: トーン (n) tone
english: But if it's the 'Keystone' you're looking for, you're too late. Don't have it.
japanese: けど、ひと足遅かったな『キーストーン』ならもう、ねぇよ

definitions: 目当て[めあて] (n) mark, guide, landmark,purpose, aim, goal, intention, end,sight (on a firearm)
english: What? You didn't come here for that?
japanese: なんだ、お前らあれ目当てで来たんじゃないのか？

definitions: 古[いにしえ] (n) antiquity, ancient times
古[ふる] (n-pref) used item, secondhand item,old, used, previous
english: The 'Keystone' is the key that unlocks the gate to a very old temple somewhere.  “You're not going to believe your ears,
japanese: 『キーストーン』ってのはこの世界のどこかにある古～い、神殿の扉を開けるカギよ

definitions: 言わす[いわす] (v5s, vt) to be able to say, to get someone to say, to induce someone to say, to let someone speak out
english: That guy had a way about him that made you feel like it may not be a good idea NOT to sell it to him…
japanese: ど～も、あの人のウムも言わさぬ迫力に負けちまってツイ…

definitions: 迫力[はくりょく] (n) impressiveness, impact, force, intensity, appeal, strength, punch, edge, vigor
english: That guy had a way about him that made you feel like it may not be a good idea NOT to sell it to him…
japanese: ど～も、あの人のウムも言わさぬ迫力に負けちまってツイ…

definitions: 対[つい] (ctr) pair, couple, set,antithesis,counter for items that come in pairs,counter for sets (of clothes, small furniture, utensils, etc.)
つい (adv) just (now),quite (near),unintentionally, unconsciously, by mistake, against one's better judgement (judgment)
終[つい] (adv) end, final,end of life, death,never, not at all
english: That guy had a way about him that made you feel like it may not be a good idea NOT to sell it to him…
japanese: ど～も、あの人のウムも言わさぬ迫力に負けちまってツイ…

definitions: 重し[おもし] (n) stone weight (as used on pickle-tub covers),weight (as used in balances)
english: Come on…it's only a legend. But if it were true, that sure would be something, huh?
japanese: だから、言い伝えだってまぁ、けど本当にあったらおもしれぇな

definitions: 材料[ざいりょう] (n) ingredients, material,material (for a novel, experiment, etc.), subject matter, data,basis (for a decision), grounds, evidence,(market) factor
english: All the weapons you see here I made myself. But lately I haven't been able to get materials…
japanese: ここの武器はぜ～んぶ、オレ様の作品だ。けど、最近は材料が手に入らなくてなぁ

definitions: 福音[ふくいん] (n, adj-no) good news,gospel (teachings or revelations of Jesus Christ)
english: Received "Great Gospel"!
japanese: 『大いなる福音』を手にいれた！

definitions: ベット (n) bet,vet
english: Oh all right. You can use that bed.
japanese: しょ～がねぇなベット使っていいぜ

definitions: 週末[しゅうまつ] (n-adv, n) weekend
english: Weekend Clock
japanese: 『週末の時計』

definitions: 時計[とけい] (n) watch, clock, timepiece
english: Weekend Clock
japanese: 『週末の時計』

definitions: 知者[ちしゃ] (n) sage, wise man, wise person, man of wisdom,buddha, bodhisattva, enlightened priest
萵苣[ちしゃ] (n) lettuce
english: Chisa's Mask
japanese: 『チサのカメン』

definitions: 画[かく] (n, n-suf, ctr) stroke (of a kanji, etc.)
画[が] (n) picture, drawing, painting, sketch
english: Dio's Portrait
japanese: 『ディオ画』

definitions: 蔵[くら] (n) warehouse, storehouse, cellar, magazine, granary, godown, depository, treasury, elevator
鞍[くら] (n) saddle
競[くら] (suf) contest, match
english: Kleine's Pot
japanese: 『クラインのつぼ』

definitions: 呼びかける[よびかける] (v1, vt) to call out to, to hail, to address,to appeal
english: Calling Gourd
japanese: 『呼びかけるひょうたん』

definitions: 氷炭[ひょうたん] (n) ice and charcoal, contradiction
瓢箪[ひょうたん] (n) gourd, calabash (Lagenaria siceraria var. gourda)
english: Calling Gourd
japanese: 『呼びかけるひょうたん』

definitions: 貸し出し[かしだし] (n, vs) lending, loaning
english: Heh, heh, heh. Sorry, but it's not for rent.
japanese: はっはははは残念だが、貸し出しは禁止だよ

definitions: 防弾チョッキ[ぼうだんチョッキ] (n) bulletproof vest
english: Received "Protect Vest"!
japanese: 『防弾チョッキ』を手に入れた！！

definitions: 青い[あおい] (adj-i) blue, azure,green,pale, gray, grey,unripe, inexperienced
葵[あおい] (n) mallow (any plant of family Malvaceae),Asarum caulescens (species of wild ginger),hollyhock
english: We shall meet again! Heh, heh, heh.
japanese: では、またあおう少年！はっはははは

definitions: 係員[かかりいん] (n) official (e.g. customs), clerk in charge
english: Staff
japanese: 係員

definitions: しゃあない (exp) it can't be helped, so it goes, c'est la vie
english: Too bad. It happens, though.
japanese: しゃあないな～。ときどきあるんですわ

definitions: 泊まる[とまる] (v5r, vi) to stay at (e.g. hotel),to be docked, to be berthed, to be moored
english: I know! Let's stay at the hotel! They know me here. I'll go talk to them.
japanese: せや！　ここのホテルに泊りましょ！ちょっと、顔きくんですわ話つけてきます～

definitions: 目指す[めざす] (v5s, vt) to aim at, to have an eye on,to go toward, to head for
english: Sephiroth must be in search of the Promised Land.
japanese: セフィロスは約束の地をめざしているはずだ

definitions: 溢れる[あふれる] (v1, vi) to overflow, to brim over, to flood
english: A land full of Mako energy. …Or at least that's what the Shinra believe.
japanese: 魔晄エネルギーに満ちあふれた豊かな土地。……これは神羅の考え方だ

definitions: 歩き回る[あるきまわる] (v5r) to walk about, to walk to and fro, to pace around
english: So Sephiroth is traveling the world because he's searching for the Promised Land? Is that it?
japanese: セフィロスが世界のあちこちを歩き回ってるのは約束の地をさがしてるのね

definitions: 退ける[のける] (v1, aux-v) to put something out of the way, to move (something, someone) aside,to remove, to exclude, to take away,to set aside, to keep apart,to remove (someone) from the group, to shun,to do well despite difficulties, to accomplish despite adversity,to do resolutely, to do boldly
避ける[さける] (v1) to avoid (physical contact with),to avoid (situation),to ward off, to avert
english: …Hojo put it on me. The rest are just war scars, but the number was done by Hojo.
japanese: ……宝条にやられたんだ。他のは戦士の魔除けだけど数字だけは宝条がやったんだよ

definitions: 本人[ほんにん] (n, adj-no) the person himself
english: That's why I think we should just go after Sephiroth himself.
japanese: だから、セフィロス本人だけ追いかければいいんじゃないかな？

definitions: ややこしい (adj-i) puzzling, tangled, complicated, complex
english: Yeah, me too! It's all just too damn confusin'.
japanese: それ、賛成だぜ！ややこしくてしょうがないからな

definitions: 白む[しらむ] (v5m, vi) to grow light, to become white, to turn grey (gray)
english: I don't know what's goin' on, but we're in a bad situation…
japanese: なんやしらんけどへんなことになってしまいましたな～
